Title: Raag Yaman: An Evening of Classical Music
Description: Experience the serene melodies of Raag Yaman, accompanied by tabla and harmonium. A perfect blend of vocal and instrumental music that takes you through the journey of this beautiful evening raag.

Title: Thumri & Dadra: Light Classical Evening
Description: An intimate concert featuring semi-classical forms like Thumri and Dadra. The performance will showcase the romantic and devotional aspects of Indian classical music.

Title: Dhrupad Dhamar: Ancient Classical Traditions
Description: Discover the oldest surviving form of Indian classical music. This concert features the profound and meditative Dhrupad style, with traditional instruments like the rudra veena.
Venue: San Jose Center for Performing Arts

Title: Fusion: Where Traditions Meet
Description: A unique fusion concert blending Indian classical music with western instruments. Experience the harmony of sitar and violin, tabla and drums, creating a mesmerizing global sound.

Title: Monsoon Ragas
Description: Welcome the monsoon season with raags traditionally associated with rain and thunder. Features popular raags like Megh and Malhar that capture the essence of the rainy season.
Venue: Mountain View Center for Performing Arts

Title: Classical Jugalbandi
Description: An exciting duet performance featuring two maestros of Indian classical music. Watch as they engage in a musical dialogue, exchanging improvisations and building to a crescendo.
